text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..1Indicates the change information of a medication item
extension 0..*ExtensionSlice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:status 0..1ExtensionThe change status of a medication
url 1..1uri"status"
valueCode:valueCode 0..1codeThe change status of a medication.
Binding: Care Connect Medication Change Status (required)
extension:indicationForChange 0..1Extension
url 1..1uri"indicationForChange"
valueCodeableConcept:valueCodeableConcept 0..1CodeableConcept
extension:dateChanged 0..1Extension
url 1..1uri"dateChanged"
valueDateTime:valueDateTime 0..1dateTime
extension:detailsOfAmendment 0..1Extension
url 1..1uri"detailsOfAmendment"
valueString:valueString 0..1string
url 1..1uri"https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/StructureDefinition/Extension-CareConnect-MedicationChangeSummary-1"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format
